Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a great location in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Pri2008
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights hotel easy 2 min walking metro station tiny lights weak clean beds comfortable corner little noisy bring ear plugs sleep night set hotel value money definitely recommend people

Reviews.Title: “Noisy and hot”
Reviews.Author: Bolly27
Reviews.Content: hotel basic clean position makes easy reach sights wish berlin foot public transport reason makes noisy tram lines meet virtually door train line close party bar road airconditioning weather hot stay meant windows throughout night receptionists helpful tv adjustment hairdryer requested eating close enjoyed ok hotel tight budget probably choose comfortable hotel time

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel, good location”
Reviews.Author: LaskoSanJose
Reviews.Content: pictures website bit surprised tight space basic adequately clean staff friendly 24 hours parking lot front hotel location convenient sightseeing berlin noisy night tram bar nearby weekday stayed road construction 7 am
